Title: Sonic the Hedgehog
Writer: Josh Miller (screenplay by), Patrick Casey (screenplay by), Oren Uziel (screenplay by), Yuji Naka (characters), Naoto Ohshima (characters), Hirokazu Yasuhara (characters), Van Robichaux (story by), Evan Susser (story by)
Actors: Jim Carrey, James Marsden, Tika Sumpter, Neal McDonough
Plot: A cop in the rural town of Green Hills will help Sonic escape from the government who is looking to capture him.
